name: McDrunkie's
description:
Come on down to the McDrunkie's Saloon! Where your cup is always cold and the laughter never ends. 

This is an adult, virtual table top game. You select your character then traverse the board, while completing various challenges. The game is the best with six players, but you can go solo if you want.

The Main Menu gives you the option of Starting a New Game, going to the Options menu to lower/mute the background theme, The Rules that explain how to play the game, the Credits menu if you see an asset or a sound you like please go to the original creator's page and check out more of their content, or to exit the game window. From Start Game you will be moved into the saloon to select character(s). This game currently has a max of 6 players and a min of 1. After that you will be moved to the game board to begin the game. The order in which you go is the same order the characters were selected on the previous screen. At this point roll the dice, click to pick up a challenge card in the lower left hand corner, and have fun!

The game is meant to be played with alcoholic beverages but, feel free to use your beverage of choice. If you are not of legal drinking age, use vegetable juice. The worst tasting, the better. 

PLEASE DRINK RESPONSIBLY! ALWAYS ESTABLISH A DESIGNATED DRIVER!
